summary.para: Retrieves the of the pixel format.

param.name: pNumericRepresentation
param.para: The address of a variable that you've defined. On successful completion, the function sets your variable to the WICPixelFormatNumericRepresentation of the pixel format.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

summary.para: Returns whether the format supports transparent pixels.

param.name: pfSupportsTransparency
param.para: Returns TRUE if the pixel format supports transparency; otherwise, FALSE.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: An indexed pixel format will not return TRUE even though it may have some transparency support.

summary.para: Extends by providing additional information about a pixel format.
